cards.title: About Me
cards.excerpt: I'm current attending the University of Victoria for a BSc in Computer Science with a focus in Software Engineering. Learn more!

cards.title: About This Site
cards.excerpt: This static site is built using Gatsby, ReactJs and all the code can easily be viewed on GitHub.

cards.title: Projects
cards.excerpt: Here are a collection of things I have recently done when I have had some spare time from work or school! Always more coming in the future.

cards.title: Tetris
cards.excerpt: As the start to a larger project, I have recently developed an in browser Tetris here on the site. Come give it a try!

cards.title: Magic Mirror
cards.excerpt: After seeing a photo online of someone who had done this, I knew I had to try making one. Thankfully the code was all open source and available on github with a very active community building all sorts of cool modules to add on
